abstract: The default highlight style to apply to text.
overview:
## Discussion

Use this constant as the value for the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSAttributedString/Key/textHighlightStyle] attribute. The system applies the default highlight color to your text. To specify a different highlight color, add the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSAttributedString/Key/textHighlightColorScheme] attribute to your text and set its value to the color you want.

# default

**Type Property**

The default highlight style to apply to text.

## Declaration

```swift
static let `default`: NSAttributedString.TextHighlightStyle
```

## Discussion

Use this constant as the value for the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSAttributedString/Key/textHighlightStyle] attribute. The system applies the default highlight color to your text. To specify a different highlight color, add the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSAttributedString/Key/textHighlightColorScheme] attribute to your text and set its value to the color you want.
title: default
